author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND CONTINUES MOVING JUST OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...RAYMOND CONTINUES MOVING JUST OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 2:00 PM MST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 19.1, -106.5 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
